metadata.title: CVE-2019-6128 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The TIFFFdOpen function in tif_unix.c in LibTIFF 4.0.10 has a memory leak,as demonstrated by pal2rgb.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.6').
